pricing.faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
pricing.faq.0.a: Yes, absolutely. Cancel anytime from your account settings. No cancellation fees, no questions asked.
pricing.faq.1.q: How does the 14-day free trial work?
pricing.faq.1.a: You get full access to all tools for 14 days ‚Äî no credit card required. After the trial, your account keeps the free tools (Keyword Research & Meta Tags). Upgrade anytime to unlock everything.
pricing.faq.2.a: Results stream in real-time. You see the output generate word-by-word ‚Äî no waiting for the full response.
pricing.faq.3.a: Your inputs are sent to the backend server over HTTPS. We never store your AI prompts or outputs. API keys are never exposed to the browser.
pricing.faq.4.a: Yes! Start on the Free plan and upgrade anytime. Your previous outputs are not affected.
pricing.faq.5.a: Yes, we offer a 7-day money-back guarantee on all paid plans. Contact support for a full refund.
